This is followed by her role as a presenter for BBC Radio 3 and an audio describer at the National Theatre. She also mentions her qualifications as a doctor of psychology and her research in AD at UCL. As the conversation progresses, she talks about her transition into studying psychology and user-centered research. The visual elements of the interview, such as her warm smile and expressive gestures, suggest that she is comfortable and confident in her role as a researcher and teacher. Overall, her career has evolved from a focus on anthropology and performance to a user-centered approach to research and teaching.
